lead_paragraph: Mike Weir shot a bogey-free six-under-par 65 for a share of the Canadian Open lead with Anthony Kim and Eric Axley during the suspended first round in Oakville, Ontario. Only half the players were able to finish the round, which was delayed by rain and lightning for 5 hours 42 minutes.
